shapecode_0_border_a=0.100
shape_0_per_frame1=r = if(above(bass, 1.2), .5*sin(time*1.234), .1*sin(time*1.234));
shape_0_per_frame2=g = if(above(bass, 1.2), .5*sin(time*1.345), .1*sin(time*1.345));
shape_0_per_frame3=b = if(above(bass, 1.2), .5*sin(time*1.456), .1*sin(time*1.456));
shape_0_per_frame4=border_a = .25*sin(time);
shape_0_per_frame5=
shape_0_per_frame6=ang = ang + .67*sin(time);
shape_0_per_frame7=rad = rad + bass*.1;
shape_0_per_frame8=
shape_0_per_frame9=frametest = equal(frame%2, 0);
shape_0_per_frame10=
shape_0_per_frame11=//x = if(frametest, x - .25*sin(time), x + .25*sin(time);
shape_0_per_frame12=x = x - .1*tan(time*3.14);
shape_0_per_frame13=y = y - .1*sin(time*3.14);
shape_0_per_frame14=x = if(frametest, x, 1-x);
shape_0_per_frame15=y = if(frametest, y, 1-y);
shape_0_per_frame16=r = if(frametest, r, b);
shape_0_per_frame17=b = if(frametest, b, g);
shape_0_per_frame18=
shape_0_per_frame19=monitor = frametest;
shapecode_1_enabled=1
shapecode_1_sides=4
shapecode_1_additive=1
shapecode_1_thickOutline=0
shapecode_1_textured=0
shapecode_1_num_inst=1
shapecode_1_x=0.500
shapecode_1_y=0.500
shapecode_1_rad=2.41456
shapecode_1_ang=0.00000
shapecode_1_tex_ang=0.00000
shapecode_1_tex_zoom=1.00000
shapecode_1_r=1.000
shapecode_1_g=0.000
shapecode_1_b=0.000
shapecode_1_a=1.000
shapecode_1_r2=0.000
shapecode_1_g2=0.000
shapecode_1_b2=0.000
shapecode_1_a2=0.000
shapecode_1_border_r=0.400
shapecode_1_border_g=0.500
shapecode_1_border_b=1.000
shapecode_1_border_a=0.100
shape_1_per_frame1=r = if(above(bass, 1.2), .3*sin(time*2.234)+.7*sin(time*1.34), 0);
shape_1_per_frame2=g = if(above(bass, 1.2), .3*sin(time*2.345)+.7*sin(time*1.57), 0);
shape_1_per_frame3=b = if(above(bass, 1.2), .3*sin(time*2.456)+.7*sin(time*1.82), 0);
shape_1_per_frame4=border_a = .25*sin(time);
shape_1_per_frame5=
shape_1_per_frame6=ang = ang + .67*sin(time);
shape_1_per_frame7=rad = rad + bass*.1;
shape_1_per_frame8=
shape_1_per_frame9=frametest = equal(frame%2, 0);
shape_1_per_frame10=
shape_1_per_frame11=//x = if(frametest, x - .25*sin(time), x + .25*sin(time);
shape_1_per_frame12=x = x - .2*sin(time*2);
shape_1_per_frame13=y = y - .2*tan(time*2);
shape_1_per_frame14=x = if(frametest, x, 1-x);
shape_1_per_frame15=y = if(frametest, y, 1-y);
shape_1_per_frame16=r = if(frametest, r, b);
shape_1_per_frame17=b = if(frametest, b, g);
shape_1_per_frame18=
shape_1_per_frame19=monitor = frametest;
shapecode_2_enabled=0
shapecode_2_sides=4
shapecode_2_additive=0
shapecode_2_thickOutline=0
shapecode_2_textured=0
shapecode_2_num_inst=1
shapecode_2_x=0.500
shapecode_2_y=0.500
shapecode_2_rad=0.10000
shapecode_2_ang=0.00000
shapecode_2_tex_ang=0.00000

shapecode_2_g=0.000
shapecode_2_b=0.000

shapecode_2_g2=1.000
shapecode_2_b2=0.000

shapecode_2_border_g=1.000
shapecode_2_border_b=1.000

shapecode_3_additive=0

shapecode_3_g=0.000

shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_init_1=x1 = 0;
per_frame_init_2=y1 = 0;
per_frame_1=vvb = if(below(vvb,0),0,vvb);
per_frame_2=vvm = if(below(vvm,0),0,vvm);
per_frame_3=vvt = if(below(vvt,0),0,vvt);
per_frame_4=vvb = if(above(vvb,1),1,vvb);
per_frame_5=vvm = if(above(vvm,1),1,vvm);
per_frame_6=vvt = if(above(vvt,1),1,vvt);
per_frame_7=vb = vb*0.85 + (1-vb)*pow(bass,2)*0.01;
per_frame_8=vvb = vvb*0.95 + (1-vvb)*vb*0.2;
per_frame_9=vm = vm*0.85 + (1-vm)*pow(mid,2)*0.01;
per_frame_10=vvm = vvm*0.95 + (1-vvm)*vm*0.2;
per_frame_11=vt = vt*0.85 + (1-vt)*pow(treb,2)*0.01;
per_frame_12=vvt = vvt*0.95 + (1-vvt)*vt*0.2;
per_frame_13=
per_frame_14=q1 = -vvb*2 + 0.5;//0.5 + vb - vvb;
per_frame_15=q2 = -vvm*2 + 0.5;//0.5 + vm - vvm;
per_frame_16=q3 = -vvt*2 + 0.5;//0.5 + vt - vvt;
per_frame_17=
per_frame_18=v=0.75*(60/fps);
per_frame_19=d = v*0.25;
per_frame_20=bb = bb + vvb*v - d;
per_frame_21=mm = mm + vvm*v - d;
per_frame_22=tt = tt + vvt*v - d;
per_frame_23=q4 = bb;
per_frame_24=q5 = mm;
per_frame_25=q6 = tt;
per_frame_26=zoom = 1.05
warp_1=`sampler sampler_cells;
warp_2=` 
warp_3=`shader_body
warp_4=`{
warp_5=`
warp_6=`    float1 d = 0.01;
warp_7=`    float1 dx = ( GetBlur2(uv + float2(d,0)) - GetBlur2(uv-float2(d,0)) ).y*1280*texsize.z;
warp_8=`    float1 dy = ( GetBlur2(uv + float2(0,d)) - GetBlur2(uv-float2(0,d)) ).y*1024*texsize.w;
warp_9=`    float2 my_uv = uv + float2(dx,dy)*0.005;
warp_10=`
warp_11=`
warp_12=`
warp_13=`//    float1 v = 0.01;
warp_14=`    ret.y = tex2D( sampler_fw_main, my_uv).y;
warp_15=`
warp_16=`    
warp_17=`//ret = 0;
warp_18=`//   ret = tex2D( sampler_cells, uv)/ lerp(ret,tex2D(sampler_main,uv_orig-my_uv+uv),0.3);
warp_19=`      // take the difference between the crisp and blurred images,
warp_20=`      // then add it back into the image.  Creates spots and stripes over time.
warp_21=`      ret.xyz += (ret - GetBlur3(uv-floor(uv)*0))*0.3 - 0.05;
warp_22=`      ret.xyz *= 1;
warp_23=`
warp_24=`      // add noise:
warp_25=`      float2 dither_uv = uv_orig*texsize.xy*texsize_noise_lq.zw * 0.25 + rand_frame.xy;
warp_26=`      ret.xyz += (tex2D(sampler_noise_lq, dither_uv).xyz-0.5)*0.1;
warp_27=`
warp_28=`      // desaturate over time, to keep the globs white
warp_29=`      ret.xyz = lerp(ret.xyz, lum(ret.xyz), 0.2);
warp_30=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=` 
comp_4=`uv *=2 ;
comp_5=`float2 m = floor(frac(uv*0.5)*2);
comp_6=`uv = frac(uv)*(1-m) + (m)*frac(1-uv);
comp_7=`uv.x=1-uv.x;
comp_8=`uv.y=1-uv.y;
comp_9=`   ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_10=`//    ret += GetBlur1(uv)*0.4; 
comp_11=`float2 uv2 = uv-.1*sin(1.5*ret.xy)+.1*sin(1.33*ret.zy);
comp_12=`   ret = tex2D(sampler_main,uv2);
comp_13=`    ret += GetBlur1(uv2); 
comp_14=`    // palettize:
comp_15=`    ret = pow(lum(ret), float3(0.9, 0.7, 0.5));
comp_16=`
comp_17=`    // invert
comp_18=`    ret = saturate(ret);
comp_19=`    ret *= 1.25*ret;
comp_20=`    //ret.xyz *= 2; // a little bit of overbright
comp_21=`}
comp_22=`
comp_23=`
